content: crochet your own green thumb with these mitts featuring vines that travel up your arms a beautiful leafy post stitch pattern graces the tops of these stretchy well-fitting mitts the ribbed cuff is worked back and forth in turned row and slip stitched to form a tube mitts are worked in the round from cuff to finger opening increasing for thumb gusset as the hand is worked the chart is worked in the round read each chart row from right to left as a rs row
